parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the loss of steering control, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: steering wheel becomes difficult to turn

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering damper or steering stabilizer can cause the vehicle to shake or vibrate violently, leading to loss of control, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: Heavy vibration in the steering wheel
especially when hitting bumps or going over bridges

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The "Death Wobble" phenomenon can cause the vehicle to shake or vibrate violently, leading to loss of control, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: especially when hitting bumps or going over bridges
steering wheel becomes difficult to turn.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unattended vehicle fires can cause significant damage to the vehicle and surrounding property, and can also pose a risk to human life.
symptoms: Vehicle catches fire while parked and unattended
no warning signs or symptoms prior to the fire
fire starts in the engine compartment.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Electrical system failures can cause a loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents or near-miss situations, and can also leave drivers stranded.
Brake system failures can cause a loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents or near-miss situations.
symptoms: and stability control warning lights illuminate

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Airbag and SOS Warning Light Illumination
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Airbag and SOS warning light illumination can indicate a potential safety risk, and can cause driver distraction or alarm.
symptoms: Airbag and SOS warning lights illuminate

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Power steering failure can cause a loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents or near-miss situations.
The failure of the clutch can cause a fire, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities. The burning smell and smoke can also cause discomfort and anxiety for the driver and passengers.
symptoms: Burning smell from the manual clutch
smoke coming from underneath the car
clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
clutch pedal sticks to the floor
clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Failure and Loss of Power
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded. The loss of transmission fluid can also cause damage to the transmission and other components.
symptoms: vehicle cannot move or loses power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the drivetrain can cause the vehicle to stop moving, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded. The inability to shift into park or start the vehicle can also cause safety risks.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Steering Stabilizer and Track Bar Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering stabilizer and track bar can cause a violent wobble through the vehicle, leading to accidents or loss of control.
